import React from 'react' import styles from './Card.module.css' import maleIcon from '../../assets/maleicon.png' import femaleIcon from '../../assets/femaleicona.png' const Card = ({ character }) => { const [isSelected, setIsSelected] = useState() return (
setIsSelected(true))}> {/* {console.log(character)} */}

{character.name}

Origem

{character.origin.name === 'unknown' ? "Desconhecida" : character.origin.name}

Espécie

{character.species}

Ultima Aparição

{character.location.name}

Status

{character.status === 'Alive' ? 'Vivo' : character.status === 'unknown' ? 'Desconhecido' : 'Morto'}

) } export default Card
